title: I2C Data Validity Timing
summary: Timing diagram showing that SDA must be stable while SCL is high and may change when SCL is low.

signals.name: SCL
signals.transitions: High periods define data valid windows; low periods allow SDA transitions.

signals.name: SDA
signals.transitions: Data held stable during SCL high; data changes occur near/within SCL low.

key_values.rule: Data line stable when clock line high
